author: Leigh Bryant
title: Director, Brand and Content
quote: Jake is our invaluable Swiss army knife, seamlessly stepping up to any challenge with expertise and a can-do attitude. His cross-functional skills, boundless energy, and dedication to growth have a ripple effect, elevating the entire team. A privilege to work with, Jake thrives even in chaos, embodying the spirit of excellence.

author: Abeiene Nejar
title: Founder, Head of Research & Strategy
quote: Jake excelled in every aspect of this project. From his impeccable design skills to his adept leadership, he navigated client interactions with finesse, managed project management like a seasoned pro, and provided unwavering support to the team. Having him as a partner in this venture was truly a stroke of luck!

author: Jessie Chang
title: Operations Manager, Product & Design Services
quote: Jake wowed the team with an outstanding project presentation! He skillfully conveyed complex concepts with clarity and confidence, maintaining his signature composed demeanor. His representation of Orium's excellence in front of a sizable audience was commendable.
